name: Synth-Pong
description:
A Classic Game reimagined in synth style made in Unreal Engine 5 with the purpose of teaching about game development. Still under development and will be a great project to learn some game development fundamentals.

Songs used in this project does not belong to me. Both are Music provided by Infraction No Copyright Music.

Track: Nobody

https://youtu.be/aUaTCOpbjcg

Track: Infraction- Not The Only One

https://youtu.be/CVg0kWNm9z0?list=PL7pkSK1xbGD78-mcgXnh32h5Z4IdKXtOl
